head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHAPIRO, MARVIN S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHAPIRO, MARVIN S.

block.p: SHAPIRO-Marvin S. Passed away Saturday, April 29, 2000. Mr. Shapiro is survived by his wife Rita of Coral Springs, FL, sons Dr. Mitchell Shapiro of Miramar, Kenneth of Coral Springs, Ronald (Susan) of Coral Springs and five grandchildren, Jason, April, Laura, Michael and Brandon. Services Monday, May 1, at Star of David Funeral Home and Cemetery.
